src:
Pazarci jure brejk u Sloveniji
Četa Olivera Popovića gostuje Rogaškoj u okviru 6. kola ABA 2 lige

05 Nov 2019

Vreme je šestu rundu Druge ABA lige. Derbi kola igra se u četvrtak u Čačku, kada Borac bude ugostio Sutjesku, ali krenimo redom. Zavesa se otvara večeras duelima Rogaške i Novog Pazara, odnosno MZT-a i Splita (19.00).
Rogaška i Novi Pazar pozicionirani su u donjem delu tabele, a bolje trenutno stoji domaćin sa pobedom više u odnosu na rivala.
Trener košarkaša Novog Pazara Oliver Popović istakao je da je Rogaška dobar domaćin i da njegovi igrači moraju da budu maksimalno fokusirani da bi napravili brejk u Sloveniji."Dve, tri pobede u gostima menjaju drastično izglede za plasman među četiri najbolja tima. Očigledno je da je ove godine domaći teren u ABA 2 veoma bitan faktor. Čeka nas teška utakmica", rekao je Popović za sajt ABA 2 lige.
Rogaška je deveta na tabeli regionalnog takmičenja sa dve pobede i tri poraza, dok je desetoplasirani Pazar na skoru 1-4."Imamo pet gostovanja u šest mečeva na startu ABA 2, ali navikli smo se i u utakmicu ulazimo maksimalno u svakom pogledu. Znamo šta nas očekuje, ali mislim da možemo do prve pobede na strani", naveo je košarkaš Pazara Stefan Matović.

ABA 2 - 6. KOLO


Utorak


19.00: (1,70) Rogaška (14,5) Novi Pazar (2,30)

19.00: (1,45) MZT (15,0) Split (3,05)


Sreda18.00: Lovćen - Dinamik
Četvrtak17.00: Sloboda Tuzla - Široki17.30: Spars - Helios19.00: Borac - Sutjeska
*** kvote su podložne promenama



Foto: ABA2/Dynamic VIP PAY/Nikola Milinković
text:
Pazarci are on the break in Slovenia
Company Oliver Popovic is visiting Rogaska in the 6th round of the ABA 2 league

05 Nov 2019

Time is the sixth round of the Second ABA League. The derby car will be played on Thursday in Cacak, when Borac hosts Sutjeska, but let's start in sequence. The curtain opens tonight with the duels of Rogaška and Novi Pazar, respectively MZT and Split (19.00).
Rogaska and Novi Pazar are positioned at the bottom of the table, and the host currently stands better with a win over rivals.
Novi Pazar basketball coach Oliver Popovic pointed out that Rogaska is a good host and that his players need to be as focused as possible in order to break even in Slovenia. this year, home ground in the ABA 2 is a very important factor. We have a tough game ahead, "Popovic told the ABA 2 League website.
Rogaška is ninth in the regional competition standings with two wins and three losses, while Pazar, 10th, is 1-4. he expects us, but I think we can reach the first victory on the side, "said Pazar basketball player Stefan Matovic.

ABA 2 - 6TH ROUND


Tuesday


19.00: (1,70) Rogaska (14,5) Novi Pazar (2,30)

7pm: (1.45) MZT (15.0) Split (3.05)


Wednesday18.00: Lovcen - Dynamic
Thursday17.00: Freedom Tuzla - Wide17.30: Spars - Helios19.00: Borac - Sutjeska
*** quotas are subject to change



Photo: ABA2 / Dynamic VIP PAY / Nikola Milinkovic
